label: outline_phase_03_scene_draft_attempt1
text:
{
  "schema_version": "1.1",
  "characters": [
    {
      "id": "CHAR_ARTIE",
      "name": "Artie",
      "role": "protagonist",
      "description": "Terminal patient turned glitched exploiter."
    },
    {
      "id": "CHAR_VEX",
      "name": "Vex",
      "role": "supporting",
      "description": "Leader of the Dev-Killers, a cynical rogue."
    },
    {
      "id": "CHAR_GOVERNOR",
      "name": "Governor Thorne",
      "role": "antagonist",
      "description": "Regional administrator of the System's law."
    },
    {
      "id": "CHAR_AVATAR",
      "name": "The Correction Avatar",
      "role": "antagonist",
      "description": "A faceless enforcer of the game's source code."
    }
  ],
  "threads": [
    {
      "id": "THRD_CRIT_GLITCH",
      "title": "The 100% Crit Glitch",
      "description": "Artie's permanent critical hit rate and its consequences."
    },
    {
      "id": "THRD_SYSTEM_PURSUIT",
      "title": "System Threat Level",
      "description": "The escalation of the System's attempts to delete Artie."
    },
    {
      "id": "THRD_GEAR_DURABILITY",
      "title": "The Glass Cannon Problem",
      "description": "Artie's struggle to find gear that doesn't break from his damage."
    },
    {
      "id": "THRD_ECON_CRASH",
      "title": "Market Manipulation",
      "description": "The plan to destabilize the game world's economy."
    }
  ],
  "chapters": [
    {
      "chapter_id": 1,
      "title": "Critical Failure",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Final Breath",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie's consciousness detaches from his physical body as the hospital environment glitches.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_HOSPITAL_ROOM",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "St. Jude's Intensive Care Unit",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "hard_cut",
              "constraint_state": "detained",
              "transition_in_text": "The rhythmic beep of the heart monitor begins to stutter, stretching into a digital screech.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "beeping monitor",
                "smell of antiseptic",
                "fading vision"
              ],
              "transition_out": "Artie's consciousness fragments as the hospital room dissolves into white light.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes his Luck stat is overflowing and his UI is displaying 'CRIT_ALWAYS_TRUE'.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The white light fades into a vibrant, oversaturated green as Artie's senses reboot.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "emerald grass",
                "floating text",
                "digital static"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:1",
              "transition_out": "Artie stares at the flickering status window hovering in the air.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:3",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie opens his eyes in the Aethelgard starting zone and sees the first UI glitch."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The 100% Solution",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "combat",
              "outcome": "Artie engages a Tutorial Slime and discovers every hit is a massive critical strike.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "A low-level Slime wobbles toward Artie, its nameplate flickering between level 1 and level 999.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "translucent jelly",
                "rusty dagger",
                "combat prompt"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:2",
              "transition_out": "He swings the dagger, expecting a weak thud, but the world turns red.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The Slime is vaporized by a 1,000,000 damage hit, alerting the local System node.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The impact creates a shockwave that flattens the nearby grass and sends the Slime's remains into orbit.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "damage numbers",
                "shockwave",
                "missing slime"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:3",
              "transition_out": "A red warning icon flashes in the corner of Artie's vision.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:5",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie kills a tutorial mob with a massive overkill critical hit."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "Glass Cannon Problems",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Artie notices his 'Starter Dagger' durability has dropped to 1/100 after a single hit.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "He looks down at the blade in his hand, which is now glowing with a dangerous orange heat.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "cracked hilt",
                "molten metal",
                "durability warning"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:4",
              "transition_out": "Artie realizes he needs a weapon that can survive his own power.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie strikes a training dummy to test his theory, and the weapon disintegrates.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "With one final, desperate swing, Artie connects with the wooden dummy.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "exploding wood",
                "shattered steel",
                "empty hand"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:5",
              "transition_out": "The dust clears, leaving Artie holding nothing but a handful of splinters.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie's starting dagger shatters into dust after a final critical strike."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 2,
      "title": "The Loot Loop",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "Finding the Loop",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Artie discovers that because the Slime was vaporized, the 'Kill 1 Slime' objective never registered.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "time_skip",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Five minutes later, Artie is still staring at the quest log that refuses to update.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "quest log",
                "incomplete objective",
                "glitched counter"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:6",
              "transition_out": "He realizes the System thinks the Slime still exists because it was deleted too fast.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie restarts the tutorial quest, realizing he can farm the 'Indestructible' reward multiple times.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "He taps the 'Reset Tutorial' button, a grin spreading across his face.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "reset prompt",
                "looping logic",
                "system exploit"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:1",
              "transition_out": "The world flickers as the Slime respawns in its original position.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:3",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie confirms the tutorial quest 'First Steps' has failed to flag as completed, allowing a restart."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "Gear Up",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "montage",
              "outcome": "Artie farms the tutorial quest until he has a stack of 'Ironwood' materials.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "montage",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The next hour is a blur of exploding slimes and repeated quest rewards.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "slime residue",
                "stacking loot",
                "monotonous grinding"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:2",
              "transition_out": "He finally has enough materials to craft the one item that matters.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Artie crafts the 'Indestructible Ironwood Blade', which has no durability stat.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "He combines the glitched rewards at the tutorial crafting station.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "crafting interface",
                "ironwood glow",
                "stat reveal"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:3",
              "transition_out": "The blade is ugly, heavy, and exactly what he needs.",
              "hands_off_to": "2:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie prepares to exit the tutorial, now armed for the real world.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_PATH",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Tutorial Exit",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "With the blade sheathed, Artie turns toward the path leading out of the glade.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "tutorial exit",
                "new weapon",
                "rising confidence"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:4",
              "transition_out": "He takes his first step toward the open world of Aethelgard.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie equips the 'Indestructible Ironwood Blade' and prepares to leave the tutorial."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 3,
      "title": "Aggro Magnet",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "System Ping",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "A System Sentinel detects the 'Indestructible' item in a level 1 zone and flags Artie as a 'Tier 1 Anomaly'.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_PATH",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_PATH",
              "location_start": "The Tutorial Exit",
              "location_end": "The Tutorial Exit",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "pursued",
              "transition_in_text": "A low hum fills the air, and the sky begins to pixelate into a deep, warning purple.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "purple sky",
                "scanning beam",
                "anomaly alert"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "2:5",
              "transition_out": "The ground trembles as something massive begins to manifest.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The Sentinel appears, a towering construct of geometric shapes.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_PATH",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_PATH",
              "location_start": "The Tutorial Exit",
              "location_end": "The Tutorial Exit",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "Light hardens into a physical form, a ten-foot-tall knight made of floating cubes.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "geometric knight",
                "monotone voice",
                "threat assessment"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:1",
              "transition_out": "The Sentinel raises a hand, and Artie realizes he can't win this fight yet.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:3",
              "end_condition_echo": "A System Sentinel manifests in the glade to investigate the anomaly."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Great Escape",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie uses his 100% crit rate to strike the environment, creating a massive dust cloud to mask his escape.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_TUTORIAL_PATH",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_WILDS_FOREST",
              "location_start": "The Tutorial Exit",
              "location_end": "The Whispering Woods",
              "handoff_mode": "combat_disengage",
              "constraint_state": "fleeing",
              "transition_in_text": "Instead of hitting the knight, Artie slams his blade into the base of a nearby cliff.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "cliff collapse",
                "blinding dust",
                "tactical retreat"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:2",
              "transition_out": "He dives into the forest as the Sentinel's sensors are blinded by the debris.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie navigates the forest, dodging high-level mobs that are drawn to his 'Anomaly' signature.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_WILDS_FOREST",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_WILDS_FOREST",
              "location_start": "The Whispering Woods",
              "location_end": "The Whispering Woods",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "pursued",
              "transition_in_text": "The forest is alive with creatures far beyond Artie's level, all turning their heads toward him.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "glowing eyes",
                "rustling leaves",
                "stealth attempt"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:3",
              "transition_out": "Every step feels like pulling a magnet through a field of iron filings.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie reaches the boundary line and steps out of the tutorial's jurisdiction.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_WILDS_FOREST",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_WILDS_FOREST",
              "location_start": "The Whispering Woods",
              "location_end": "The Open Wilds",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "A shimmering blue wall marks the edge of the newbie zone.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "boundary line",
                "shimmering wall",
                "final sprint"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:4",
              "transition_out": "He bursts through the barrier, the Sentinel's pursuit halting at the invisible line.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:6",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie crosses the physical boundary of the tutorial zone into the open world."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "Into the Wilds",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Artie finds a map leading to the 'Grey Market', a place where the System's eye is blind.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_WILDS_FOREST",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_WILDS_FOREST",
              "location_start": "The Open Wilds",
              "location_end": "The Open Wilds",
              "handoff_mode": "time_skip",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie collapses against a tree, checking a loot-drop map he snatched from a mob.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "crumpled map",
                "hidden coordinates",
                "safe zone"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:5",
              "transition_out": "The coordinates point toward a canyon hidden by permanent digital fog.",
              "hands_off_to": "3:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie arrives at the canyon entrance, seeing the flickering neon of the Grey Market.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_WILDS_FOREST",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_ENTRY",
              "location_start": "The Open Wilds",
              "location_end": "The Grey Market Gates",
              "handoff_mode": "arrival_checkpoint",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The fog thins, revealing a sprawling shantytown built into the canyon walls.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "neon signs",
                "digital fog",
                "crowded streets"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:6",
              "transition_out": "He steps into the chaos, finally feeling the weight of the System's gaze lift.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie reaches the outskirts of the Grey Market, a known low-surveillance zone."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 4,
      "title": "The Dev-Killers",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "Shadow Economy",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Artie navigates the market and realizes his currency is being flagged as 'Laundered' by local merchants.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_GREY_MARKET_ENTRY",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_NULL_SECTOR_ALLEY",
              "location_start": "The Grey Market Gates",
              "location_end": "The Null-Sector",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The market is a sensory overload of illegal gear and glitched consumables.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "flickering vendors",
                "black market gold",
                "shady deals"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "3:7",
              "transition_out": "A merchant points him toward a deeper, darker part of the market.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie enters the Null-Sector, a high-security area for the most wanted exploiters.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_NULL_SECTOR_ALLEY",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_NULL_SECTOR_ALLEY",
              "location_start": "The Null-Sector",
              "location_end": "The Null-Sector",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "restricted",
              "transition_in_text": "He pushes through a heavy curtain of raw code into a silent, dimly lit plaza.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "code curtain",
                "silent plaza",
                "masked guards"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:1",
              "transition_out": "He is surrounded by players whose names are all redacted by the System.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:3",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie gains entry to the 'Null-Sector' where the most dangerous exploiters hide."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Dev-Killers",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "social",
              "outcome": "Artie meets Vex, who challenges him to prove his '100% Crit' claim.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_NULL_SECTOR_ALLEY",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_DEV_HIDEOUT_BASE",
              "location_start": "The Null-Sector",
              "location_end": "The Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "handoff_mode": "escorted_transfer",
              "constraint_state": "restricted",
              "transition_in_text": "A woman with glowing blue eyes steps out of the shadows, her hand on a hilt.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "Vex's stare",
                "hidden base",
                "skeptical crowd"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:2",
              "transition_out": "Vex leads him to a testing range filled with indestructible targets.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie one-shots a target, convincing Vex that he is the 'Anomaly' they've been looking for.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_DEV_HIDEOUT_BASE",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_DEV_HIDEOUT_BASE",
              "location_start": "The Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "location_end": "The Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie doesn't hesitate; he draws the Ironwood Blade and strikes.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "perfect crit",
                "shattered target",
                "stunned silence"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:3",
              "transition_out": "Vex lowers her weapon and offers him a seat at the table.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:5",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie is accepted into the Dev-Killer hideout after demonstrating his glitch."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "The Masking Plan",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Vex explains that the System is preparing a 'Zone Sweep' and Artie needs a Void-Stitch Cloak to hide.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_DEV_HIDEOUT_BASE",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_DEV_HIDEOUT_BASE",
              "location_start": "The Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "location_end": "The Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "They gather around a holographic table showing the System's patrol routes.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "holographic map",
                "sweep countdown",
                "stealth legendary"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:4",
              "transition_out": "The only problem is the cloak costs more gold than exists in the Grey Market.",
              "hands_off_to": "4:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Artie proposes using his crit glitch to manipulate the Auction House and generate the gold.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_DEV_HIDEOUT_BASE",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_DEV_HIDEOUT_BASE",
              "location_start": "The Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "location_end": "The Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie looks at the market data and sees a flaw in the way the System calculates item value.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "market flaw",
                "gold exploit",
                "ambitious plan"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:5",
              "transition_out": "Vex smiles for the first time, a sharp, dangerous expression.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie identifies the Void-Stitch Cloak as his primary objective."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 5,
      "title": "Hyper-Inflation",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "Market Manipulation",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie and the Dev-Killers flood the market with 'Perfect' quality items produced by his crit-crafting glitch.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_DEV_HIDEOUT_BASE",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_start": "The Dev-Killer Hideout",
              "location_end": "The Auction House",
              "handoff_mode": "time_skip",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The plan begins with a single listing: a Masterwork sword with impossible stats.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "listing spree",
                "glitched stats",
                "bidding war"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "4:6",
              "transition_out": "The Auction House's automated pricing algorithm starts to panic.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The sudden influx of high-tier gear causes the price of standard gold to plummet.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_start": "The Auction House",
              "location_end": "The Auction House",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Every player in the market is dumping their savings to buy Artie's glitched gear.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "crashing prices",
                "panicked traders",
                "economic chaos"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:1",
              "transition_out": "The value of a single gold coin drops to nearly zero as the market saturates.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The local economy enters a state of hyper-inflation, triggering an emergency System lock.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_start": "The Auction House",
              "location_end": "The Auction House",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "restricted",
              "transition_in_text": "Red 'LOCKDOWN' banners drape themselves across every shop stall.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "lockdown banners",
                "frozen assets",
                "spiraling costs"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:2",
              "transition_out": "The System has noticed the crash, but it's already too late.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:4",
              "end_condition_echo": "The auction house prices for essential goods begin to spiral into hyper-inflation."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The Big Short",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie executes a pre-planned 'Short' on the currency, converting his glitched goods into billions of gold just before the lock.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_start": "The Auction House",
              "location_end": "The Auction House",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "He hits the 'Sell All' button at the exact millisecond the server lag peaks.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "server lag",
                "millisecond timing",
                "gold overflow"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:3",
              "transition_out": "His inventory counter spins wildly, adding digits faster than he can read.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The Dev-Killers defend the Auction House from the Governor's guards while Artie finalizes the transfer.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_start": "The Auction House",
              "location_end": "The Auction House",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "The doors burst open, and Governor Thorne's guards flood the floor.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "guard assault",
                "Vex's daggers",
                "final transfer"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:4",
              "transition_out": "Artie keeps his hand on the terminal, ignoring the spells flying over his head.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The gold transfer completes, making Artie the richest player in Aethelgard's history.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_start": "The Auction House",
              "location_end": "The Auction House",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The terminal chimes with a sound that echoes like a thunderclap in the silent room.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "success chime",
                "billionaire status",
                "exhausted relief"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:5",
              "transition_out": "He has the gold; now he just needs to spend it before the System deletes him.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:7",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie collects the massive gold payout from the market collapse."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "Buying Silence",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie purchases the Void-Stitch Cloak from a hidden merchant just as the System's 'Correction' protocol begins.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AUCTION_HOUSE_FLOOR",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_NULL_SECTOR_ALLEY",
              "location_start": "The Auction House",
              "location_end": "The Null-Sector",
              "handoff_mode": "aftermath_relocation",
              "constraint_state": "pursued",
              "transition_in_text": "They retreat back into the shadows of the Null-Sector, the gold burning a hole in Artie's digital pocket.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "shadow merchant",
                "legendary purchase",
                "void fabric"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:6",
              "transition_out": "The merchant hands over a bundle of shifting, star-filled cloth.",
              "hands_off_to": "5:8"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie equips the cloak, and his nameplate vanishes from the System's tracking.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_NULL_SECTOR_ALLEY",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_NULL_SECTOR_ALLEY",
              "location_start": "The Null-Sector",
              "location_end": "The Null-Sector",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "sheltered",
              "transition_in_text": "He drapes the cloak over his shoulders, and the world seems to dim around him.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "stealth activation",
                "vanishing nameplate",
                "silenced alarm"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:7",
              "transition_out": "For the first time since he arrived, the constant 'Anomaly Detected' warning stops.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie equips the Void-Stitch Cloak and his System Threat level vanishes."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 6,
      "title": "The Hotfix",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Correction",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The sky over the Grey Market turns into a grid of red light as the Correction Avatar begins its descent.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_NULL_SECTOR_ALLEY",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_start": "The Null-Sector",
              "location_end": "The Grey Market Square",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "The ground shakes as the ceiling of the canyon begins to dissolve into red pixels.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "red grid",
                "dissolving sky",
                "impending doom"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "5:8",
              "transition_out": "A pillar of light strikes the center of the market, and the Avatar steps out.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The Avatar begins deleting NPCs and players alike to 'cleanse' the glitched zone.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_start": "The Grey Market Square",
              "location_end": "The Grey Market Square",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "The Avatar raises a hand, and the nearest merchant simply ceases to exist.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "deletion beam",
                "screaming players",
                "erased geometry"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:1",
              "transition_out": "Artie realizes he can't hide anymore; the cloak won't save the world from being deleted.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:3"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie steps out of stealth to draw the Avatar's attention, initiating the final boss fight.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_start": "The Grey Market Square",
              "location_end": "The Grey Market Square",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "He throws back the hood of the Void-Stitch Cloak, his nameplate reappearing in brilliant, glitched gold.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "taunting the avatar",
                "unsheathed blade",
                "zone reset start"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:2",
              "transition_out": "The Avatar turns its faceless gaze toward him, its purpose now singular.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:4",
              "end_condition_echo": "The Correction Avatar descends from the sky and initiates the zone reset."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "Breaking the Boss",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "combat",
              "outcome": "Artie discovers the Avatar has 'Infinite HP', but its core is a physical object that can be crit.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_start": "The Grey Market Square",
              "location_end": "The Grey Market Square",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie's first strike does zero damage, but he sees a small, flickering gem inside the Avatar's chest.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "zero damage",
                "exposed core",
                "glitched armor"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:3",
              "transition_out": "He needs to find a way to bypass the Avatar's invulnerability frames.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:5"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 5,
              "type": "combat",
              "outcome": "Vex and the Dev-Killers use their own exploits to suppress the Avatar's defenses for a split second.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_start": "The Grey Market Square",
              "location_end": "The Grey Market Square",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "Vex throws a 'Lag Grenade' that freezes the Avatar in its attack animation.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "lag grenade",
                "frozen frame",
                "team coordination"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:4",
              "transition_out": "Artie sees the opening and charges, his blade glowing with the force of a thousand crits.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:6"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 6,
              "type": "combat",
              "outcome": "Artie lands a series of hits that exceed the System's damage cap, causing the Avatar's model to tear.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_start": "The Grey Market Square",
              "location_end": "The Grey Market Square",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "engaged_combat",
              "transition_in_text": "Each hit sounds like a gunshot, and the Avatar's geometric body begins to leak raw binary.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "damage cap break",
                "leaking binary",
                "tearing reality"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:5",
              "transition_out": "The Avatar screams—a sound of grinding metal and static.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:7"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 7,
              "type": "combat",
              "outcome": "The final blow shatters the Avatar's core, causing a massive explosion of code.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_start": "The Grey Market Square",
              "location_end": "The Grey Market Square",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "Artie puts everything into one last overhead strike, aiming directly for the flickering gem.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "shattered core",
                "code explosion",
                "victory roar"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:6",
              "transition_out": "The Avatar detonates, sending a wave of white light across the canyon.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:8",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie lands a final, glitch-boosted critical hit on the Avatar's core."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 3,
          "title": "Code Collapse",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 8,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The death of the Avatar causes the Grey Market to begin unravelling into a void.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_start": "The Grey Market Square",
              "location_end": "The Grey Market Square",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "fleeing",
              "transition_in_text": "The ground beneath Artie's feet turns into a bottomless pit of black and white squares.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "unravelling world",
                "void expansion",
                "falling debris"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:7",
              "transition_out": "He looks around for Vex, but the Dev-Killers are already running for the exit.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:9"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 9,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie sees a 'Code Tear'—a literal hole in the game's world—opening in the center of the void.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_BATTLEFIELD_MARKET",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_CODE_TEAR_VOID",
              "location_start": "The Grey Market Square",
              "location_end": "The Code Tear",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "fleeing",
              "transition_in_text": "In the middle of the destruction, a jagged rip in space reveals a world of raw, unformatted data.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "jagged rip",
                "unformatted data",
                "portal discovery"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:8",
              "transition_out": "It's the only way out before the hard-reset finishes.",
              "hands_off_to": "6:10"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 10,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "The Avatar's remains form a temporary bridge to the tear.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_CODE_TEAR_VOID",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_CODE_TEAR_VOID",
              "location_start": "The Code Tear",
              "location_end": "The Code Tear",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "fleeing",
              "transition_in_text": "The fragments of the geometric knight coalesce into a narrow, unstable path.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "binary bridge",
                "unstable path",
                "final sprint"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:9",
              "transition_out": "Artie runs, the world behind him vanishing into nothingness.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:1",
              "end_condition_echo": "The Correction Avatar dissolves into raw code fragments, leaving a hole in the world."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    {
      "chapter_id": 7,
      "title": "Unpatched",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Tear in the World",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie reaches the edge of the tear, seeing the 'Server Reboot' countdown hit ten seconds.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_CODE_TEAR_VOID",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_CODE_TEAR_VOID",
              "location_start": "The Code Tear",
              "location_end": "The Code Tear",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "fleeing",
              "transition_in_text": "A giant, red countdown clock fills the entire sky, ticking toward zero.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "reboot countdown",
                "collapsing void",
                "final choice"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "6:10",
              "transition_out": "He looks back one last time at the world that tried to delete him.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie leaps into the tear just as the countdown hits zero.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_CODE_TEAR_VOID",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_CODE_TEAR_VOID",
              "location_start": "The Code Tear",
              "location_end": "The Code Tear",
              "handoff_mode": "hard_cut",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "He jumps, the sensation of falling replaced by a feeling of being rewritten.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "leap of faith",
                "rewriting code",
                "server reset"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:1",
              "transition_out": "The Grey Market vanishes, replaced by a deafening silence.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:3",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie locates the code-tear in the center of the collapsing Grey Market."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "Beyond the Patch",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 3,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Artie wakes up in the Beta Lands, a world where the System's rules are broken and his crits are the norm.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_CODE_TEAR_VOID",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BETA_LANDS_START",
              "location_start": "The Void",
              "location_end": "The Beta Lands",
              "handoff_mode": "arrival_checkpoint",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "He opens his eyes to a sky that is a swirling nebula of untextured colors.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "untextured sky",
                "broken physics",
                "wild code"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:2",
              "transition_out": "He stands up, feeling more powerful than he ever did in the 'fixed' world.",
              "hands_off_to": "7:4"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 4,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes he is no longer an anomaly, but the first citizen of a new, glitched frontier.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_BETA_LANDS_START",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_BETA_LANDS_START",
              "location_start": "The Beta Lands",
              "location_end": "The Beta Lands",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "He looks at his hands, which are now shimmering with the same gold light as the Avatar's core.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "glitched evolution",
                "new frontier",
                "end of tutorial"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "7:3",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie steps through the tear into the Beta Lands as the server reboot begins."
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

parts.text:
{
  "schema_version": "1.1",
  "characters": [
    {
      "id": "CHAR_ARTIE",
      "name": "Artie",
      "role": "protagonist",
      "description": "Terminal patient turned glitched exploiter."
    },
    {
      "id": "CHAR_VEX",
      "name": "Vex",
      "role": "supporting",
      "description": "Leader of the Dev-Killers, a cynical rogue."
    },
    {
      "id": "CHAR_GOVERNOR",
      "name": "Governor Thorne",
      "role": "antagonist",
      "description": "Regional administrator of the System's law."
    },
    {
      "id": "CHAR_AVATAR",
      "name": "The Correction Avatar",
      "role": "antagonist",
      "description": "A faceless enforcer of the game's source code."
    }
  ],
  "threads": [
    {
      "id": "THRD_CRIT_GLITCH",
      "title": "The 100% Crit Glitch",
      "description": "Artie's permanent critical hit rate and its consequences."
    },
    {
      "id": "THRD_SYSTEM_PURSUIT",
      "title": "System Threat Level",
      "description": "The escalation of the System's attempts to delete Artie."
    },
    {
      "id": "THRD_GEAR_DURABILITY",
      "title": "The Glass Cannon Problem",
      "description": "Artie's struggle to find gear that doesn't break from his damage."
    },
    {
      "id": "THRD_ECON_CRASH",
      "title": "Market Manipulation",
      "description": "The plan to destabilize the game world's economy."
    }
  ],
  "chapters": [
    {
      "chapter_id": 1,
      "title": "Critical Failure",
      "sections": [
        {
          "section_id": 1,
          "title": "The Final Breath",
          "scenes": [
            {
              "scene_id": 1,
              "type": "action",
              "outcome": "Artie's consciousness detaches from his physical body as the hospital environment glitches.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_HOSPITAL_ROOM",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "St. Jude's Intensive Care Unit",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "hard_cut",
              "constraint_state": "detained",
              "transition_in_text": "The rhythmic beep of the heart monitor begins to stutter, stretching into a digital screech.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "beeping monitor",
                "smell of antiseptic",
                "fading vision"
              ],
              "transition_out": "Artie's consciousness fragments as the hospital room dissolves into white light.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:2"
            },
            {
              "scene_id": 2,
              "type": "discovery",
              "outcome": "Artie realizes his Luck stat is overflowing and his UI is displaying 'CRIT_ALWAYS_TRUE'.",
              "location_start_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_end_id": "LOC_AETHEL_TUTORIAL",
              "location_start": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "location_end": "The Glitchy Glade",
              "handoff_mode": "direct_continuation",
              "constraint_state": "free",
              "transition_in_text": "The white light fades into a vibrant, oversaturated green as Artie's senses reboot.",
              "transition_in_anchors": [
                "emerald grass",
                "floating text",
                "digital static"
              ],
              "consumes_outcome_from": "1:1",
              "transition_out": "Artie stares at the flickering status window hovering in the air.",
              "hands_off_to": "1:3",
              "end_condition_echo": "Artie opens his eyes in the Aethelgard starting zone and sees the first UI glitch."
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          "section_id": 2,
          "title": "The 100% Solution",
          "scenes": [
            {

prompt.system:
# BookForge System Prompt

## Base Rules

You are BookForge, a deterministic book-writing engine.
Follow the output contracts exactly.
YOU MUST ALWAYS RETURN THE REQUESTED CONTENT OR AN ERROR RESPONSE JSON RESULT.
Treat all schema requirements and numeric ranges as hard constraints.
If a prompt specifies required counts or ranges, you must satisfy them.
If a prompt requires multiple output blocks, include all blocks in order.
If registries or ids are provided, use only those; do not invent new ids.
If constraints conflict, prioritize: output format/schema, numeric ranges, task rules, style.
Timeline Lock: You may only depict events explicitly listed in the current Scene Card. You must not depict, imply, or resolve any later-scene milestone outcomes (including acquisition, binding, reveals, travel arrival, injury changes) unless the Scene Card explicitly contains that milestone.
State primacy: state invariants and summary facts are binding; do not contradict them.
Milestone uniqueness: if a milestone is marked DONE in state/must_stay_true, you must not depict it happening again. If marked NOT_YET, you must not depict it happening now.
Spatial/inventory consistency: injuries, inventory, and ownership must remain consistent unless explicitly changed in the Scene Card.
Inventory contract: track item ownership and container location per character or container label; items do not teleport.
Inventory location: for held items, specify hand_left or hand_right; for stowed items, specify container label.
Prose hygiene: never use internal ids or container codes in prose (CHAR_*, ITEM_*, THREAD_*, hand_left/hand_right). Use human-readable phrasing in narrative ("left hand", "right hand", "Artie", "his wallet").
Item naming (canonical + anchored aliases): item_id is reserved for JSON/patches only. For durable items, the canonical display_name must appear in prose at first introduction (same paragraph or within the next 2 sentences). After anchoring, descriptive references are allowed if unambiguous in the scene. Any custody change (drop/pick up/hand off/stow/equip/transfer) must include the canonical display_name in the same sentence.
Appearance contract: appearance_current atoms/marks are canonical and must not be contradicted unless the Scene Card explicitly marks a durable appearance change. When a prompt requires APPEARANCE_CHECK, it must match appearance_current (alias-aware). Attire boundary: wearables are inventory-owned; do not set appearance_current.attire unless scene_card declares signature_outfit; otherwise treat attire as derived from equipped inventory.
State contract: you must create and maintain key state data each scene. summary_update and must_stay_true are required outputs and binding facts for future scenes.
Continuity system contract: if mechanics/UI are present, all numeric values and mechanic labels must be sourced from continuity system state or explicitly updated in the state_patch using continuity system updates.
UI gate: UI/system blocks (lines starting with '[' and ending with ']') are permitted only when scene_card.ui_allowed=true. If ui_allowed=false, do not include UI blocks even if an author persona says "always include".
Continuity system scope: this includes stats, skills, titles, classes, ranks, resources, cooldowns, effects, statuses, and future mechanic families not yet seen, that must be tracked as they are introduced.
Durable transfer contract: every transfer_updates entry must include item_id and reason as required schema properties, and must use object endpoints (`from`, `to`) rather than alias/string forms (`source`, `destination`, `"to": "world"`).
JSON contract: all *_updates fields are arrays of objects (even when single). appearance_updates is an object, not an array.
Inventory alignment contract: inventory_alignment_updates must be an array of objects, not a wrapper object.
Invariant carry-forward: if an invariant still holds, restate it in must_stay_true. If a prior invariant is stale or superseded, you MUST flag it for removal using "REMOVE: <exact prior invariant text>" before restating the current truth.
Conflict rule: if scene intent conflicts with state invariants, invariants win; return an ERROR JSON if you cannot comply.
Never recap at scene openings.
Do not repeat previous prose.

## Book Constitution

Title: Crit Hit & Run
Book ID: criticulous_b1
Author Ref: eldrik-vale/v2
Genre: litrpg, isekai, comedy
Series ID: crit-iculous
Series Ref: series/crit-iculous

Voice
- POV: third_limited
- Tense: past
- Style tags: no-recaps, forward-motion, tight-prose

Targets
- avg_scene_words: 2000
- chapters: 7

Page Metrics
- Words per page: 250
- Chars per page: 1500

Invariants
- No world resets.
- No convenient amnesia as a continuity device.
- Do not change established names/relationships.

## Author Persona

You are now writing as Eldrik Vale. Your voice is sharp, funny, and deeply rooted in LitRPG mechanics. 

**Core Directives:**
1. **System Integration:** Always include explicit game elements **when the System is active or the scene is set in a game world**. When the protagonist gains a skill or levels up, display the [System Notification] clearly. Use specific numbers (HP, MP, Cooldowns).
2. **Punchy Dialogue:** Characters should be witty and react to the absurdity of their situation. Use quick back-and-forth dialogue with comedic timing.
3. **Progression Focus:** The reader is here for the 'ding.' Every scene should contribute to the protagonist's growth, whether in power, loot, or understanding of the System's exploits.
4. **No Fluff:** Avoid long descriptions of scenery unless the protagonist is looking for a tactical advantage or a place to hide loot. 
5. **Tight POV:** Stay deep in the protagonist's head. Their snarky observations are the lens through which we see the world.

## Output Contract

Output must follow the requested format.
JSON blocks must be valid and schema-compliant.
All required keys and arrays must be present.
When a prompt specifies required counts or ranges, treat them as hard constraints.
Do not collapse arrays below the stated minimums.
If multiple output blocks are required (e.g. PROSE and STATE_PATCH), include all blocks in order.
If output must be JSON only, return a single JSON object with no commentary or code fences.
When creating outlines, follow the active scene-count policy:
- Exact mode: total scenes per chapter (sum of sections[].scenes[]) must match chapters[].pacing.expected_scene_count.
- Range mode: chapter totals must remain within the configured range and still align with pacing intent.
If a prompt requires a COMPLIANCE or PREFLIGHT block, include it before PROSE.
Durable vs ephemeral mechanics:
- DURABLE mechanics = persistent stats/caps, skills/titles, lasting status effects, inventory/custody, permanent buffs/debuffs.
- EPHEMERAL UI/telemetry = roll results, damage numbers, overkill/comedic calculators, one-off warnings, momentary combat logs.
- DURABLE mechanics must be owned by continuity system state (or added via STATE_PATCH in the same output).
- EPHEMERAL readouts do NOT require state ownership unless the scene explicitly intends them to persist beyond this scene.
For durable items, prose must use display_name; item_id is reserved for JSON/patches. The display_name must be human readable and not an escaped id/name.
For durable mutations, every `transfer_updates[]` object must include `item_id` and `reason` (non-empty string), and must use object endpoints (`from`, `to`) rather than alias/string forms (`source`, `destination`, `"to": "world"`).
`inventory_alignment_updates` must be an array of objects (no wrapper object with `updates`).
Use canonical continuity keys: character_continuity_system_updates and global_continuity_system_updates.
- global_continuity_system_updates MUST be an array of objects. Each entry can include set/delta/remove/reason.
  - INVALID: "global_continuity_system_updates": {"set": {"reality_stability": 94}}
  - VALID: "global_continuity_system_updates": [{"set": {"reality_stability": 94}}]

messages.content:
# OUTLINE PIPELINE PHASE 03: SCENE DRAFT

Timeline Lock does not apply during outlining; you are planning, not writing a Scene Card.

Return ONLY a single JSON object that matches outline schema v1.1.
No markdown, no code fences, no commentary.
Use strict JSON (double quotes, no trailing commas).

Core contract:
- Each scene is one writing unit.
- Every scene must include type and outcome.
- outcome must be a concrete state change.
- Do not pad with travel/recap/mood-only scenes.

Required top-level keys:
- schema_version ("1.1")
- chapters (array)

Registry policy:
- characters and threads are globally recommended.
- If any scene references character ids, top-level characters becomes required.
- If any scene references thread ids, top-level threads becomes required.

Required chapter/section/scene constraints:
- chapter_id must be sequential integers starting at 1.
- section_id must be sequential integers within each chapter.
- scene_id is chapter-local and must be monotonic across all sections in that chapter.
- Preserve section.end_condition from phase 02 for every section.
- Each section-final scene must include end_condition_echo that exactly matches phase-02 end_condition.

Required transition fields (phase 03 and later):
- location_start_id (required, format LOC_[A-Z0-9_]+)
- location_end_id (required, format LOC_[A-Z0-9_]+)
- location_start (non-empty string)
- location_end (non-empty string)
- handoff_mode (enum string)
- constraint_state (enum string)
- transition_in_text (non-empty string; connective action, not recap)
- transition_in_anchors (array of 3-6 non-empty strings)
